thread.title: Jaw-dropping castles you probably didn’t know existed in the U.S. (20 Photos)
thread.title_full: Jaw-dropping castles you probably didn’t know existed in the U.S. (20 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: Jaw-dropping castles you probably didn’t know existed in the U.S. (20 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
If you want to have your own “Beauty and the Beast” moment then you should seriously consider staying in one of these awesome castles. I thought you had to go to Europe to see castles like this, but turns out there are plenty spread across the U.S. 
They’re a mix of bed and breakfasts and luxury hotels, but they are all equally stunning. Not a bad idea to look into for a summer vacation. 
If you’ve visited one of the castles share your experience in the comments. 2 
Mission Inn Hotel and Spa, California 4 
The Inn at Erlowest, New York Advertisement
